reviews.review: One of the best 1VS4 horror games! But it would be cool to have more gamemodes like in Identity V. Like 2VS8 or classic killers only.
the game is enjoyable.You can do funny things with your friends.There is also a competitive element of the game as well. 10/10

I've played DBD since it's release, not constantly but enough to see many changes and improvements. Whilst there have been a number of attempts to create a similar experience none ever live up to what DBD provides.

the devs do not listen to the community anymore. they release a public test build and ignore all reports and input on their forums. 2 Major updates in a row they've broken the game and made countless players leave and streamers search for new games. 
The first update came out entirely broken (an achievment unachievable) and released a killer that, as far as feedback had gathered, was unhealthy for the game because of their unfun playstyle. literally nothing was fixed that update.
the second was a UI and animation overhaul that literally no one asked for. the test feedback for the UI was 90% negative and it looks like a mobile game. There was no response from the devs for a month, then they pushed it live anyway, after the player base complained and the charts dipped they made a comment that they would fix it and the new mock up doesnt even look much better. the animation changes also broke the desync between killer and survivor. playing survivor is currently in its most unfun form and considering that it takes 4 survivors to one killer for a match, the queue times are just getting worse. 
 I try to like this game ive played for 4 years (i do love it in a way) but its going downhill fast. maybe wait a while and see if its worth the hours of grinding and bugs and broken updates. currently the disrespect the Developers show to the game and the community just isnt something anyone should support. they dont care about the major game problems, they do just enough to keep people playing and thats it.

also if your colorblind there are several maps that are not colorblind friendly and have been "updated" the devs only recently said they would make a colorblind mode, but that was after a different dev said "stop asking for it, its annoying" so expect it to be a sloppy, hastily made attempt at a peace offering.

Takes too long to unlock things (as in, hundreds of hours, not just a few dozen) AND it's basically pay to win since you need to get the DLC's for the good perks. Not to mention survivor is a lot more unfun compared to killer especially if you play alone.

I love the game, just a shame that you get some people DC because things are not going there way. but aye you get that with most games. 
The concept is really good and the community as a whole is is one of the betters ones i have seen. Definitely better than on the PS4 version.

The game is very interesting and attracts with this, but there is a problem in the rating of this game, let's say the account rating is updated every month, some people played 5, 6, 10 thousand in this game and they have not played conditionally a couple of months, their rating is from the first,  decreased by 15 or 20, and at the time when they want to play some newcomer who will not play for 100 hours and will not understand the game mechanics, tactics and the like will play.
He will be faced by the player who is already not trying hard to win the game, because he knows how to better run away from the killer on the survivor, how best to drop the palette so as not to get a hit, or the killer who fell to low levels, he has most of the killers  3 prestige and he played as many games on each as the newcomer did not win in total, he knows how best to cheat the survivor, and since he is a newcomer against him, itâ€™s easier for him hundreds or thousands of times.
He doesnâ€™t enjoy such games, no doubt when you are a beginner and a skilled killer, he makes a mistake and 1 person escapes from him and by some miracle you are, yes, nice, but in one game session there are 5 people, 4 survivors and 1 killer.
And sometimes it happens when playing against or on a killer, there are people with a connection, and sometimes I play as a survivor with a friend and itâ€™s noticeably much easier to play, because there is no voice communication in the game and this is for the better, but newcomers playing against a team that plays better than you  moreover, if they have a voice connection, they wonâ€™t be able to win, he can hang 1-3 people, but Iâ€™m silent about the kill, you can kill 1-2 people only if you stand right in front of their face and wait until they die in the apricot,  but even by choosing this tactic you can get a bunch of angry comments  in profile, from the category such that "You do not know how to play, do not run this game anymore", "You are a camper, a weak player", "What the heck, face camper, I hope your parents *****".
 Even though you have a difference in the level of the game of several thousand hours in this game, but they do not care, they constantly insult, try to humiliate.
 But thereâ€™s a really nice part in this game, itâ€™s very rare, but there have been times when you lose to a strong killer and you are left alone and he put you as a friend, the killer can carry you to the hatch, it seems to me that this is simply respect for the survivor who  I ran and played better than others.
 From this it is nice that there are good people in the community.
 I hope there will be more and the game will get better.
great game waqiting for some more killers to bw added or some new game modes

Overall verdict: This game can be fun with friends. By yourself with three randoms will suck 99% of the time. It will take a long time to get good with this game, and even with all of that, a good amount of luck is involved. If you have friends to play this game with, or you just plan on playing killer, go for it.

I say yes simply because it's a fun game at some points and the way it used to be was genuinely fun. I recommend in hopes that maybe theyll balance the game again. Behaviour has made everything extremely hard on those who enjoy playing survivor. They buff killers and nerf survivors to the point where the killer queue is 20 minutes because no one wants to play survivor anymore as they made it extremely difficult. I usually play survivor, queue time definitely isnt an issue but i can see why killer mains are upset about it. They continue to nerf survivors and add a bunch of new things for killers that make it virtually impossible to escape as a survivor. (Unless the killer is very new or very bad at the game, which you do not see at higher ranks.) Its very easy for killers to follow cheap tactics such as slugging, camping, and tunnelling, thus making the game very difficult and not fun for the survivors. Especially since 85% of the games I play im met with someone on my team disconnecting. I used to play this game nearly everyday, but ever since the ungodly amount of nerfs, I have strayed away from playing. It's either play as survivor and have a bad time, or wait in a 20-30 minute queue to be killer only to have survivors disconnect.
The actual embodiment of cancer. don't play this game unless you genuinely hate and despise you're life.
muy buen juego una vez q le agarras la mano
